title: If you're jungling and don't have the first drag by 10 mins.
body:
Stop going jungler and play support instead because that's about the only position you have the IQ to play.

The instant the clock hits 10 mins and no one has a drag, I AFK. Not wasting my time with these trash players.

replies.body: You are such a cutie ðŸ˜‰

there are alot of things to consider when taking early dragons.

unless I'm playing a jungler who can safely solo drag and still escape if the enemy team turns up (such as when I'm playing ad or fed ap shaco), if mid and bot aren't either pushed in or are in a position where they can fight off their enemy laners and if the enemy jungler isn't dead or top. I don't try early dragons. I might be a little cowardly but I think that this is a decent principal to follow when looking to take a dragon.
Might need to take your head out of your ass first mate, then try and post something worth discussing.

Is this a troll or legit post? Maybe the circumstances haven't presented themselves for your team to take the drake?

Or maybe you need to initiate drake yourself with the right set up and ask your team to help you/back you up?
